prompt:
TITLE: SUITES GEOMETRIQUES - L essentiel en une image

GLOBAL LAYOUT:
- Landscape format, clean educational infographic for French high school (1ere)
- White background with soft purple and teal accent colors
- Divided into 5 main zones: central formula banner, 2 top zones, 2 bottom zones
- Clear visual hierarchy: central formula most prominent

CENTRAL BANNER (horizontal strip in middle):
- Background: gradient from light purple to light teal
- Large prominent text in center: the formula u_n = u_0 x q^n
- The exponent n should be clearly visible as superscript
- This formula should be the LARGEST text element, clearly readable
- Subtitle below formula: Forme explicite - calcul direct du terme n

TOP LEFT ZONE - DEFINITION:
- Title in purple: DEFINITION
- Content: Une suite geometrique est une suite ou chaque terme se calcule en MULTIPLIANT toujours par le meme nombre q le precedent
- Visual: horizontal arrow chain showing u_0 then arrow labeled x q then u_1 then arrow labeled x q then u_2 then dots
- Small boxed formula: u_{n+1} = q x u_n labeled Recurrence
- Note: q est appele la RAISON de la suite
- Important: q doit etre strictement positif

TOP RIGHT ZONE - LIEN AVEC LES POURCENTAGES:
- Title in purple: POURCENTAGES
- Two important formulas in colored boxes:
- Green box: Augmentation de t pourcent then arrow then multiplier par (1 + t/100)
- Red box: Diminution de t pourcent then arrow then multiplier par (1 - t/100)
- Example: +4 pourcent then arrow then x 1.04
- Note: Le coefficient multiplicateur devient la raison q

BOTTOM LEFT ZONE - REPRESENTATION GRAPHIQUE ET VARIATIONS:
- Title in purple: GRAPHIQUE ET VARIATIONS
- Three mini-graphs side by side showing:
- Graph 1 (green border): q > 1, exponential curve going UP, red points on curve, label Croissance exponentielle
- Graph 2 (red border): 0 < q < 1, exponential curve going DOWN toward zero, blue points, label Decroissance exponentielle
- Graph 3 (gray border): q = 1, horizontal line, points aligned horizontally, label Constante
- Each graph with n on horizontal axis and u_n on vertical axis

BOTTOM RIGHT ZONE - APPLICATIONS:
- Title in purple: APPLICATIONS
- Two columns:
- Left column titled q > 1 Croissance: Bank icon with Interets composes, Virus icon with Propagation epidemie, People growing icon with Croissance demographique
- Right column titled 0 < q < 1 Decroissance: Atom icon with Radioactivite, Thermometer icon with Refroidissement, Decreasing icon with Amortissement
- Visual distinction between growth and decay applications

MASCOT (bottom right corner, small):
- Cute manga chibi style character
- Scandinavian young man named Sven with blonde hair, light blue eyes
- Wearing teal sweater with fibonacci spiral pattern
- Making peace sign transitioning to infinity gesture with calm serene smile
- Small speech bubble: Multiplier c est geometrique
- Should be discrete, not too large

STYLE DETAILS:
- Clean sans-serif font throughout
- Purple for titles and main accents
- Teal for highlights and secondary elements
- Green for growth concepts, Red for decay concepts
- Rounded corners on all boxes
- Subtle shadows for depth
- Exponential curves should look smooth and clear
- Professional educational look suitable for classroom display
- All text in French without accents for clean rendering
